resources.string: Iniciar sessão na sua Conta Mi para activar o Inicio de Sessão Seguro
É possível este requisito tenha sido desligado através do seu navegador de desktop ou tenha sido activo outro token de segurança Mi.
Conta：%1$s o token de segurança expirou.
Para verificar que tem a chave correcta para %1$s verifique se o valor corresponde ao valor de verificação de integridade fornecido pelo servidor:
Copiar para a área de transferência
A palavra-passe que introduziu está correcta
A palavra-passe que introduziu está correcta

Os dados foram importados com sucesso a partir da aplicação Autenticador Xiaomi obsoleto. Agora é seguro para desinstalar a versão anterior da aplicação clicando abaixo. Importação com sucesso Descodificar excepção "Reactivar: Inicie sessão em account.xiaomi.com e clique Reactivar." _ _ _ _ _ _ Introduza o nome da conta Introduza a sua chave A chave tem caracteres ilegais Adicionar Entrada de conta manual A chave é demasiado pequena Introduza este código de verificação se for pedido durante o inicio de sessão: Não é possivel guardar segredo vazio Desculpe, esse nome já está a ser utilizado. Não foi possível intrepertar o código QR. Erro Chave não reconhecida. Esqueceu palavra-passe Excepção de segurança geral O seu dispositivo não suporta gravação de vídeo. Como funciona This app will generate the code needed to proceed with sign in. "If you're on a new computer, enter a code from your phone." "However, if you're at a new computer or device, Xiaomi will ask you for a special code to make sure it's really you." "To sign in, you'll enter your password." "You can also choose to remember the computer and Xiaomi won't ask you for a code there again." "Then you're signed in." Install To scan barcodes containing keys, you must install the ZXing barcode scanner. Install barcode scanner? Create a password to protect your account Attention Create a password to protect your account Choose your pattern Confirm your pattern Confirm your pattern Confirm Continue Draw pattern again to confirm Inconsistent with the previous entry, please re-enter: Password wrong,you can enter %d times more Your new unlock pattern: Pattern recorded. Connect at least %d dots. Try again: Release finger when done. Draw an unlock pattern: Redraw Reset pattern password Como desenhar um padrão de bloqueio Try again in %d seconds. Too many incorrect attempts! Enter your Mi Account password http://www.Xiaomi.com/policies/privacy/ Privacy policy Loading… Removing this account will remove your ability to generate codes, however, it will not turn off 2-step verification. This may prevent you from signing into your account.

Before removing:

  • Turn off 2-step verification for this account, or
  • Ensure you have an alternate mechanism for generating codes.
Remove account "Removing this account will remove your ability to generate codes. This may prevent you from signing into your account. Before removing: —Turn off 2-factor authentication for this account, or —Ensure you have an alternate mechanism for generating codes." Remove account? Rename Rename %1$s Reset Save key for Scan MiID Place and scan a MiID barcode inside of this viewfinder. Secret saved Security settings Settings Save Has been copied to clipboard Password reset successfully Password created Require a unique pattern lock for MiCredit http://m.Xiaomi.com/tospage Terms of service About this feature "If you press "Sync now", Authenticator will attempt to sync its internal clock with Google servers once. The device's Date & Time settings will not be changed.

Authenticator does not transmit any personal data or account information while synchronizing its internal clock with Google servers.

Why this is useful

Authenticator generates 2-step verification codes based on 1) the current time, and 2) a secret number known to the app and the server.

If Authenticator and the server disagree on what time it is, the codes that the app generates may not be accepted when you try to log in.

By default Authenticator uses the device's Date & Time settings, and in most cases you will be able to generate valid codes by making sure your time, date, and time zone settings are configured correctly. However, when time mismatches do occur, they can be hard to troubleshoot (especially if you use network-provided time or time zones)." About this feature "Sync Authenticator's internal clock with servers" Time correction for codes "There was a problem contacting 's server. Please check your network settings and try again." Sync now Sync now Connecting to server… Sync now Sync now "Authenticator's internal clock was not adjusted because it appears to already be in sync with servers." Time already correct "Authenticator's internal clock has been adjusted to match the time provided by servers. The Date & Time settings on this device have not been changed." Time corrected Reinstall and reactivate Touch reset to clear account data and reactivate.
